title: Demi Vollering: ‘Tour de France Femmes Grand Départ at Home Will Be Great’
content:
Winner of the Tour de France Femmes avec Zwift last year, Dutch superstar Demi Vollering is aiming to win a second yellow jersey in a race that starts in her home region.

Read the full article at Demi Vollering: ‘Tour de France Femmes Grand Départ at Home Will Be Great’ on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
